channel.title: [P.I] Duel rule problem
channel.description: When you click on the armour not to wear before you start a duel it takes it off you but you can just wear it again.. ?

item.title: [P.I] Duel rule problem
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Just check to see if the player is currently in a duel arena session, and if so, if the rules prevent items from being equipped, when the player tries to equip and item.

Something like

public void equip(final int item) {
    // check to see that the player actually has the item
    if (player.isDueling()) {
        final DuelArenaSession session = player.getDuelSession();
        if (session.getRules().contains(DuelingRules.NO_ARMOR)) {
            if (ItemRepository.getItemById(item).isArmor()) {
                return;
            }
        }
    }
    // normal equip stuff
}

Read full topic
